page.title: 03GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: On our playground and at home we play such games as Kinger,Polo,Kerbs,Hide and Seek and Touch.Kinger, to start the game the players stand in a circle with legs apart.A ball is dropped in the middle of the circle and if the ball goes through somebody's legs that person is "IT".The player then takes the ball and chases the rest of the group.The player throws the ball at the rest of the players.If the ball hits another player that person is also"up".This continues until all are caught. Kerbs, you need 2 players and a ball.One player stands on one side of the road,the other player stands on the opposite side.One player throws the ball and tries to bounce it off the kerb.If the ball hits the opponent the player who throw the ball gets one point.The game continues like that.
